channel.title: OpenEmu Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.4.2
item.description:
OpenEmu v2.4.2

  • Core Management: New multi-column layout for better visibility.
  • Crash Fix: Resolved stability issue when clicking update buttons.
  • Updates: Direct 'Update' and 'Revert' actions for installed cores.
